EmailTemplate.name: 21_MyAero-Portal-Updates_Year-Program_Email_Operational.February Refer To Networ
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Portal Updates – Technical Publications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Here are the latest portal updates that have been made to Technical Publications: Email Notifications Link – We moved the “My Email Notifications” link to below the search bar so that you can easily and quickly access the publications you have requested to receive email updates on.
Model Unit – the “Model Unit” line has moved up under the publication title. For training topics pages related to the portal, please refer to and bookmark this page: TRAINING TOPICS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics]]> Please be sure to Opt-In to receive important portal enhancement update emails. OPT-IN <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>
